Create a modular design that allows users to customize the roller skates by swapping out different parts such as wheels, frames, and boots.
Develop a smartphone app that tracks the user's progress and provides personalized training programs to help them improve their skating skills.
Integrate augmented reality technology into the roller skates that provides real-time feedback on the user's form and technique.
Introduce a line of roller skates that are designed for specific activities such as hockey, artistic roller skating, or speed skating.
Develop a line of roller skates that are designed to be more comfortable and breathable, using materials such as memory foam and moisture-wicking fabrics.
